title: da vinci DOORS logo
content:
Hi friend somebody can ID these fonts used on this logo (da vinci) DOORS

thanks in advanced

Miguel

author: hernandomiguel

comments.content:
Except for the ’d’ da Vinci is Da Vinci, I think:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/da-vinci/p22-da-vinci-forward/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080127184540/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/da-vinci/p22-da-vinci-forward/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/da-vinci/p22-da-vinci-forward/")
The R doesn’t match Dante Titling. Sabon is close but not quite it either.

Hi friends thank

what abaout the font used on da vinvi?

thanks

Miguel
